snippet.title: New York Nights for iPhone / iPod touch: 1st trailer!
snippet.description:
Follow us at http://twitter.com/new_york_nights for exclusive info and gifts!

The best selling social simulation game on mobile finally arrives on  iPhone and iPod Touch! Praised by the press, New York Nights is far from your traditional social sim.

Check this first trailer, more to come soon!

New York Nights: Success in the City / OUT MAY 2009
